string-array.name: opisi
string-array.item: Top-tier GPU in the 30 series lineup. Aimed at enthusiast gamers and professionals. Features 24 GB of GDDR6X memory. Offers excellent performance for 4K gaming and content creation tasks like 3D rendering and video editing.

High-end GPU suitable for enthusiast gamers. Comes with 10 GB of GDDR6X memory. Provides great performance for gaming at 1440p and 4K resolutions. Widely regarded as offering a very good balance between price and performance.
Positioned as a high-performance GPU for mainstream gamers. Features 8 GB of GDDR6 memory. Offers excellent performance for gaming at 1440p resolution and good performance for 4K gaming.
A mid-range GPU aimed at gamers who want good performance without breaking the bank. Comes with 8 GB of GDDR6 memory. Provides solid performance for gaming at 1080p and 1440p resolutions.
Entry-level GPU in the 30 series lineup. Suitable for budget-conscious gamers. Offers 12 GB of GDDR6 memory. Provides decent performance for gaming at 1080p resolution and light 1440p gaming.
The flagship of AMD\'s RX 6000 series, featuring the RDNA 2 architecture. It offers excellent 4K gaming performance and competes with Nvidia\'s RTX 3090.
Another high-end offering from AMD, slightly below the 6900 XT in performance but still providing excellent gaming capabilities, especially at 1440p and 4K resolutions.
Positioned slightly lower than the 6800 XT but still delivering strong performance, particularly for high-resolution gaming. It\'s a great choice for gamers aiming for 1440p gaming.
Designed to deliver exceptional performance for 1440p gaming, offering a balance of price and performance. It\'s a good choice for gamers who prioritize high frame rates at QHD resolutions.
Positioned as a mid-range option, offering solid 1080p and 1440p gaming performance at a more affordable price point compared to the higher-end models.
